AbilityDef.label: painblock II
AbilityDef.description: Block pain pathways in the target's brain for a short time. This can allow a person to move and act even with grievous injuries which would normally incapacitate them.

AbilityDef.label: painblock III
AbilityDef.description: Block pain pathways in the target's brain for a short time. This can allow a person to move and act even with grievous injuries which would normally incapacitate them.

AbilityDef.label: painblock IV
AbilityDef.description: Block pain pathways in the target's brain for a short time. This can allow a person to move and act even with grievous injuries which would normally incapacitate them.

AbilityDef.label: painblock V
AbilityDef.description: Completely block pain pathways in the target's brain for a short time. This can allow a person to move and act even with grievous injuries which would normally incapacitate them.

AbilityDef.label: painblock Ω
AbilityDef.description: Completely block pain pathways in the target's brain for a short time. This can allow a person to move and act even with grievous injuries which would normally incapacitate them.

AbilityDef.label: stun II
AbilityDef.description: Momentarily disrupt motor function in the target's brain, preventing any movement.

AbilityDef.description: Momentarily disrupt motor function in the target's brain, preventing any movement.

AbilityDef.description: Momentarily disrupt motor function in the target's brain, preventing any movement.

AbilityDef.label: burden II
AbilityDef.description: Slow the target for a short time by suppressing motor activity in the brain.

AbilityDef.label: blinding pulse II
AbilityDef.description: Induce noise in the visual centers of the brain, obscuring vision of everyone near the target point.

AbilityDef.label: blinding pulse III
AbilityDef.description: Induce noise in the visual centers of the brain, obscuring vision of everyone near the target point.

AbilityDef.label: neural heat dump II
AbilityDef.description: Instantly dump all your neural heat into someone else. As a side-effect, the target will fall into a debilitating but non-damaging coma for 85% of a day. The target must actively accept the psychic invasion, so only conscious allies can be targeted.

AbilityDef.label: neural heat dump III
AbilityDef.description: Instantly dump all your neural heat into someone else. As a side-effect, the target will fall into a debilitating but non-damaging coma for 70% of a day. The target must actively accept the psychic invasion, so only conscious allies can be targeted.

AbilityDef.label: neural heat dump IV
AbilityDef.description: Instantly dump all your neural heat into someone else. As a side-effect, the target will fall into a debilitating but non-damaging coma for 55% of a day. The target must actively accept the psychic invasion, so only conscious allies can be targeted.

AbilityDef.label: neural heat dump V
AbilityDef.description: Instantly dump all your neural heat into someone else. As a side-effect, the target will fall into a debilitating but non-damaging coma for 40% of a day. The target must actively accept the psychic invasion, so only conscious allies can be targeted.

AbilityDef.label: neural heat dump Ω
AbilityDef.description: Instantly dump all your neural heat into someone else. As a side-effect, the target will fall into a debilitating but non-damaging coma for 25% of a day. The target must actively accept the psychic invasion, so only conscious allies can be targeted.

AbilityDef.label: beckon II

AbilityDef.label: vertigo pulse II
AbilityDef.description: Interfere with the spatial orientation sense of everyone near the target point, causing intermittent loss of balance. Flesh creatures will become extremely nauseous as well.

AbilityDef.label: smokepop II
AbilityDef.description: Skip dust particles up from under the ground surface to form a thick cloud. This reduces the accuracy of any shot fired through it, and prevents turrets from locking on entirely.

AbilityDef.description: Douse a target area in water, extinguishing fires. The water is archotechnologically skipped from distant bodies of water or underground aquifers.

AbilityDef.label: flashstorm II
AbilityDef.description: Use differential-pressure skipgates in the atmosphere to generate a localized flashstorm. The storm will strike the area with lightning for some time before dissipating.

AbilityDef.label: skipshield II
AbilityDef.description: Generate a spherical skipgate that sends all incoming and outgoing ground-level projectiles to some distant place. People and items are not affected.

AbilityDef.label: skipshield III
AbilityDef.description: Generate a spherical skipgate that sends all incoming and outgoing ground-level projectiles to some distant place. People and items are not affected.

AbilityDef.label: solar pinhole II
AbilityDef.description: Generate a microscopic skipgate linked to the core of a nearby star. Solar material leaks through the pinprick in spacetime, illuminating and warming the surrounding area until it closes. The light is enough to work by, but not enough to grow plants.

AbilityDef.label: solar pinhole III
AbilityDef.description: Generate a microscopic skipgate linked to the core of a nearby star. Solar material leaks through the pinprick in spacetime, illuminating and warming the surrounding area until it closes. The light is enough to work by, but not enough to grow plants.

AbilityDef.label: word of trust II
AbilityDef.description: Speak to the prisoner while using psychic suggestion to reduce his resistance to recruitment. This can only reduce a prisoner's resistance, but cannot recruit him.

AbilityDef.label: word of trust III
AbilityDef.description: Speak to the prisoner while using psychic suggestion to reduce his resistance to recruitment. This can only reduce a prisoner's resistance, but cannot recruit him.

AbilityDef.label: word of joy II
AbilityDef.description: Speak happy, calming words to someone while using psychic suggestion to implant a joyfuzz loop in his mind. The joyfuzz will suppress uncomfortable thoughts and sensations in the target to improve mood. This has the side-effect of dulling sensation and decision-making, which reduces consciousness.

AbilityDef.label: word of joy III
AbilityDef.description: Speak happy, calming words to someone while using psychic suggestion to implant a joyfuzz loop in his mind. The joyfuzz will suppress uncomfortable thoughts and sensations in the target to improve mood. This has the side-effect of dulling sensation and decision-making, which reduces consciousness.

The joyfuzz will suppress uncomfortable thoughts and sensations in the target to improve mood. This has the side-effect of dulling sensation and decision-making, which reduces consciousness.

AbilityDef.label: word of love II
AbilityDef.description: Speak about someone's romantic virtues while using psychic suggestion to implant romantic desire in the listener. For days afterward, the listener will feel psychically-induced romantic attraction towards the other person. This greatly increases opinion and makes them much more likely to attempt romantic advances and marriage proposals if they get the chance. This power can be used to connect two other people, induce love for the caster, or force oneself to love another.

AbilityDef.label: word of serenity II
AbilityDef.description: Use calming words and psychic suggestion to end a mental break on a person or animal. The target will fall into a short psychic sleep. The psyfocus cost depends on the intensity of the target's mental break.

AbilityDef.label: word of serenity III
AbilityDef.description: Use calming words and psychic suggestion to end a mental break on a person or animal. The target will fall into a short psychic sleep. The psyfocus cost depends on the intensity of the target's mental break.

AbilityDef.label: word of inspiration II
AbilityDef.description: Speak words encouraging creativity while psychically hypercharging the target's mind with new ideas. The target will experience a random inspiration appropriate to them.

AbilityDef.label: farskip II
AbilityDef.description: Skip the caster, along with anyone standing near him, to an ally at a distant location. This can send people far across the planet, but only works if there is a willing ally on the other side to use as a navigation beacon. The skipped people will always appear near a random ally on the target map.

AbilityDef.label: farskip III
AbilityDef.description: Skip the caster, along with anyone standing near him, to an ally at a distant location. This can send people far across the planet, but only works if there is a willing ally on the other side to use as a navigation beacon. AbilityDef.label: neuroquake II
AbilityDef.description: Find a discontinuity in the psychic field and unfold it, releasing a massive amount of psychic energy. Every creature in range but outside of the safe, inner, circle will be driven violently insane. Casting this takes 10.8 seconds of meditation, and afterwards, the caster will go into a psychic coma for a little over four days. The disturbing neuroquake echoes will inflict pain on everyone for many kilometers around, causing diplomatic consequences with all factions.
AbilityDef.confirmationDialogText:
If you use neuroquake, everyone in this region will feel the neuroquake echo, you will lose goodwill with every non-hostile faction.

Neuroquake takes 10.8 seconds to cast, and cannot be interrupted. When complete, the caster will fall into a psychic coma for a little over 4 days.

Everyone in range except those in a small circle around the caster will be affected.

Do you really want to cast neuroquake?

AbilityDef.label: neuroquake III
AbilityDef.description: Find a discontinuity in the psychic field and unfold it, releasing a massive amount of psychic energy. Every creature in range but outside of the safe, inner, circle will be driven violently insane. Casting this takes 10.2 seconds of meditation, and afterwards, the caster will go into a psychic coma for four days. The disturbing neuroquake echoes will inflict pain on everyone for many kilometers around, causing diplomatic consequences with all factions.
AbilityDef.confirmationDialogText:
If you use neuroquake, everyone in this region will feel the neuroquake echo, you will lose goodwill with every non-hostile faction.

Neuroquake takes 10.2 seconds to cast, and cannot be interrupted. When complete, the caster will fall into a psychic coma for 4 days.

Everyone in range except those in a small circle around the caster will be affected.

Do you really want to cast neuroquake?

Casting this takes 9.6 seconds of meditation, and afterwards, the caster will go into a psychic coma for almost four days. The disturbing neuroquake echoes will inflict pain on everyone for many kilometers around, causing diplomatic consequences with all factions.

Casting this takes 6 seconds of meditation, and afterwards, the caster will go into a psychic coma for around two-and-a-half days. The disturbing neuroquake echoes will inflict pain on everyone for many kilometers around, causing diplomatic consequences with all factions.

AbilityDef.description: Skip the 5 chunks of rock or slag to scatter them near the target point. This is useful for producing cover during offensive operations.
